price: ߖߌߦߟߍߡߊ߲߫ ߕߍ߫ ߊ߬ ߝߍ߬ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߤߊߞߟߌ ߦߟߍ߬ߡߊ߲߬ߞߏ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߊ߬ ߝߍ߬
arabic: لَا فِيهَا غَوۡلٞ وَلَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا يُنزَفُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lā fīhā ghawlun walā hum ʿanhā yunzafūna
